1312560.description:
ABOUT
They played guitar together, watched the stars at night together, and told each other they would be together forever. He wished that someday, he could help her put on that wedding dress he saw in the store window.
The plot of this game is their romance, a romance with nothing particularly special. Or perhaps, it would also be of separation…


【故事】STORY
When I turned on the light, I saw that…

Besides the mattress, a small table and a few paper crates, there was nothing in that room.
If I count the small basins and the thermos by the boxes are appliances, then maybe the small desk lamp and portable heater would also be appliances too.
Besides the two of us and the appliances that I just mentioned, there was nothing in the room save for a wooden guitar.

——This was the first time in my life I saw something so “spartan”

——『……It’s organized very clean.』

Her cheeks flushed red——

——『……Sorry that there is nothing I can welcome you with.』

…………

The bright moonlight flowed in through the windows.
Just like that other time long ago.


CHARACTER
Du Lin，a first year in medical university. Coming from a family of medical practitioners, he also chose the same path as his stepfather and his brother. But because of his fear of blood, he is unable to do surgery. Leaving his hometown to go to a faraway place on a life of his own. He lived a normal life, until that day when he bumped into the young girl living next to him.

Li Xiye， a girl who lives alone for the sake of her studies. She’s cute and resilient, but her family background is poor and she’s feels somewhat inferior. Her studies are excellent and she wants to become a lawyer, usually quiet but sometimes also standing out.

Zuo Qingfeng， a friend of the protagonist, with extraordinarily wealthy parents. Although he’s overflowing with money, he’s still a nice guy. He thinks in unusual ways, but can always pull through in the important moments. He also loves his girlfriend dearly.

FEATURE
※Critically acclaimed plot and scriptwriting
※Carefully composed original soundtrack
※Voice acting for all non-protagonist characters
※Many achievements to collect on Steam
